original_text: You may see your neighbour's cow or sheep that has become lost. If so, do not look the other way. You must catch the animal. You must take it back to your neighbour.
korean_text: 네 형제의 소나 양이 길 잃은 것을 보거든 못 본 체하지 말고 너는 반드시 그것들을 끌어다가 네 형제에게 돌릴 것이요

sentences.original_text: You may see your neighbour's cow or sheep
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 이웃의 소나 양을 볼 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: If so, do not look the other way
You must take it back to your neighbour
